gold.user: User wants to retrieve details of a specific queue identified by its Sid to check its current status and attributes.
gold.ideal: Response should include the queue's name, current size, and any other relevant details.

gold.user: User needs to update the properties of an existing queue, such as changing its name or max size.
gold.ideal: Response should confirm the update and return the updated queue details.

gold.user: User wants to delete a specific queue that is no longer needed to free up resources.
gold.ideal: Response should confirm successful deletion of the queue.

gold.user: User wants to list all queues associated with their account to manage them effectively.
gold.ideal: Response should include an array of queues with their respective details.

gold.user: User needs to create a new queue for managing incoming calls more efficiently.
gold.ideal: Response should return the details of the newly created queue, including its Sid.
